Posted By: 541Troll (2/3/2013 1:49:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Rampager is bonkers. It's almost like someone said "How can we make [Colossal Might](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Colossal Might) better? Why by giving you the option to play it as a 4/4 with trample of course!"  
  
Sure can only play it when you attack, but who cares when your hitting your opponent for 6,7, or 8? Oh and it's a creature with trample when you need it. For four mana. I love bloodrush.  
  
Absolutely love this card. 4.7/5
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
If this would have been printed as a demon from Rakdos for ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol),  
i would not have had any doubts that this was, in fact, a demon.  
Those chains and the gloomy, fire-lit background seem to suggest  
that the scene takes place somewhere underground.  
  
So i actually wonder if this artwork was originally intended for a Rakdos demon.  
I'm not going to complain though - this is a great beast card.

*[RAKDOS THE DEFILER](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=RAKDOS THE DEFILER)*: **I AM A DEMON OF THE ANCIENT WORLD. A CREATURE FAR BEYOND ANY OF YOU. WIELDER OF THE FLAME OF UDUN.
